title: Stocks With Rising Relative Strength: Alphabet Cl C
text:
BREAKING: Futures Loom After 'Good' Inflation Data     On Tuesday, Alphabet Cl C (GOOG) received an upgrade to its Relative Strength (RS) Rating, from 67 to 72. X



 IBD's proprietary rating identifies price action with a 1 (worst) to 99 (best) score. The grade shows how a stock's price performance over the trailing 52 weeks stacks up against all the other stocks in our database. Decades of market research shows that the stocks that go on to make the biggest gains often have an 80 or better RS Rating as they launch their largest price moves. See if Alphabet Cl C can continue to rebound and clear that threshold. Can You Really Time The Stock Market? Alphabet Cl C is working on a consolidation with a 155.20 buy point. See if it can break out in volume at least 40% higher than normal. In terms of fundamentals, the company has posted rising EPS growth over the last four quarters. Revenue growth has also increased over the same time frame. Alphabet Cl C holds the No. 10 rank among its peers in the Internet-Content industry group. Meta Platforms (META), Kanzhun ADR (BZ) and Direct Digital (DRCT) are among the top 5 highly rated stocks within the group.
